remarks: Any limit of a finite or infinite sum in the nonnegative extended reals is the union of the sets limits, since this set is a singleton. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jun-2017.)
statement:
xrge0tsmseq.g $e |- G = ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.

xrge0tsmseq.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
xrge0tsmsbi $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( G tsums F ) <-> C = U. ( G tsums F ) ) ) $.
